start.text: Hey captain, you ever seen a Thunder up close? Heheheh.
Hey captain, you see that stealth fighter? Heheheh.
Your ships are no match for my fighters, general.
Do you know how to stop a Warthog, captain? Hmm, me neither! Hahaha!

start_boss.text: Would you look at that. Domain military spending at its best.
Don't worry, commander. This is just the quiet before the storm.
Hmm, that's a lot of point defence, captain. Think it will be enough to calm the fear?

retreat.text: I guess it's time for me to go find a good airline job.
You may have won the battle, captain, but the war is far from over!

out_of_missiles.text: Sh, did you hear that? Oh, I wouldn't worry. It's probably nothin'. Heh heh.

engaged.text: Here comes the rain of terror!
How are you enjoying the shock and awe, captain?
I don't appreciate you shooting down my fighters, captain.
Watch the void, commander. We're gonna put on an airshow.
You don't mind if we drop in, do you, captain?

pursuing.text: Don't seem fair, does it, captain?
Ready or not - here I come.

running.text: It's time to pull the goalies - everyone attack!
Sorry commander, just taking a lunch break. Be with you in a minute.
You forced me to use guns. I hate using guns.
Get out of my air space, captain.
The enemy is in our perimeter, all fighters return to carrier.

hull_90.text: I'm done playing with you, captain.
Were you planning on using... Harsh language now?

hull_50.text: You'll regret destroying that hangar, captain.

hull_30.text: I'll get you for this, captain.
They're coming in the back door!
Curse you, captain! You hit another hangar and I'll come for you personally.

overload.text: Ouch! That must have been expensive.
Hey, how about we call this one a draw?

death.text: I can't believe you beat me, captain.
Mhh, looks like you defeated me this time, captain.

victory.text: It's awfully quiet out there. You didn't leave, did you?
I win, you lose. What more is there to say?
